name: Creatures of the Ice
description:
(Select Play In-Browser to start. Best played in fullscreen.)

You can feel the chill biting at your fingertips before you open your eyes. Every inch of your exposed skin is covered by a layer of freezing air. You feel it seeping into your skin, your bones, your blood. You can't breathe, every intake of breath feels like an icy stab on your lungs.

 Cold, cold, cold…

You wake up in an unknown location, the last hints of frost nipping at you. With only silence to accompany your wake, you try to find out what has happened to you in this text-based adventure game.
